concept.title: Specialization hierarchy
concept.shortdesc: (Specialized elements only) This section explains the specialization base for an element and lists the module in which the element is defined.

conbody.p: The wording for this section will vary, depending on the levels of specialization.

stentry.p: The codeph element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the programming domain module.

strow.stentry: Domain that is specialized from another domain

stentry.p: The syntaxdiagram element is specialized from fig. It is defined in the syntax-diagram domain module, which is a specialization of the programming domain module.
